home.subtitle: Junior Full-Stack Developer
home.description: Java&React Full-Stack Developer programmer based in Warsaw and I'm passionate and ambitious to my work.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description: Full-stack developer, I create backend with databases and frontend apps. I am always looking for the latest and well works solutions.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.subtitle: An enthusiastic beginner frontend developer with a strong passion for web technologies. I possess a solid foundation in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and experience with the React.js library.
frontend.1: I build responsive user interfaces in line with project guidelines.
frontend.2: I ensure proper functioning of the application across different browsers and devices.
frontend.3: I collaborate with the backend team to ensure a consistent and effective application performance.
frontend.4: I use code quality control tools such as linters and code formatters.
frontend.5: I continually develop my skills and learn new frontend technologies.

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.subtitle: A committed Junior Backend Developer with a basic knowledge of Java, Node.js, and SQL. Eager to learn and develop to deliver reliable and efficient backend services.
backend.1: I design and implement simple backend services according to business requirements.
backend.2: I work with databases, creating and optimizing queries.
backend.3: I ensure the proper functioning of services through testing and debugging.
backend.4: I collaborate with the frontend team, providing them with the necessary APIs.
backend.5: I am dedicated to continually improving my skills and learning new backend technologies.

database.title: Database Developer
database.subtitle: A junior database specialist with a passion for optimization and creating effective solutions. I implement modern technologies and best practices to ensure smooth and efficient data management.
